mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY POST_DATE) AS NUM , A.ADT_CODE AS ADT_CODE , A.CAT_NAME AS CAT_NAME , U.NICKNAME AS USER_NICKNAME , A.RSQ_DATE AS RSQ_DATE , CT.SPECIES AS CAT_TYPE , CS.SEX AS CAT_SEX , A.CAT_AGE AS CAT_AGE , AD.SI || ' ' || AD.GU || ' ' || AD.DONG AS CAT_ADDRESS , CA.CAT_AGE_TYPE AS CAT_AGE_TYPE , AP.ADT_PROC AS ADT_PROC , AT.ADT_TYPE AS ADT_TYPE , A.HIT_COUNT AS HITCOUNT , A.POST_DATE AS POST_DATE , A.CAT_REP_IMG AS CAT_IMAGE , A.CAT_ECT1 AS CAT_ECT1 , A.CAT_ECT2 AS CAT_ECT2 , U.ID AS USER_ID , U.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME , U.TEL AS USER_TEL , U.EMAIL AS USER_EMAIL , A.HIT_COUNT AS HIT_COUNT FROM ADT_REG A LEFT JOIN USER_REG U ON A.USER_CODE = U.USER_CODE LEFT JOIN CAT_TYPE CT ON A.CAT_SPECIES = CT.SPECIES_CODE LEFT JOIN CAT_SEX CS ON A.CAT_SEX = CS.SEX_CODE LEFT JOIN ADDRESS AD ON A.CAT_ADDRESS = AD.ADDRESS_CODE LEFT JOIN ADT_CAT_AGE CA ON A.CAT_AGE_CODE = CA.CAT_AGE_CODE LEFT JOIN ADT_PROCESS AP ON A.ADT_PROC_CODE = AP.ADT_PROC_CODE LEFT JOIN ADT_TYPE AT ON A.ADT_TYPE = AT.ADT_TYPE_CODE ORDER BY A.POST_DATE DESC

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY POST_DATE) AS NUM , A.ADT_CODE AS ADT_CODE , A.CAT_NAME AS CAT_NAME , U.NICKNAME AS USER_NICKNAME , A.RSQ_DATE AS RSQ_DATE , CT.SPECIES AS CAT_TYPE , CS.SEX AS CAT_SEX , A.CAT_AGE AS CAT_AGE , AD.SI || ' ' || AD.GU || ' ' || AD.DONG AS CAT_ADDRESS , CA.CAT_AGE_TYPE AS CAT_AGE_TYPE , AP.ADT_PROC AS ADT_PROC , AT.ADT_TYPE AS ADT_TYPE , A.HIT_COUNT AS HITCOUNT , A.POST_DATE AS POST_DATE , A.CAT_REP_IMG AS CAT_IMAGE , A.CAT_ECT1 AS CAT_ECT1 , A.CAT_ECT2 AS CAT_ECT2 , U.ID AS USER_ID , U.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME , U.TEL AS USER_TEL , U.EMAIL AS USER_EMAIL , A.HIT_COUNT AS HIT_COUNT FROM ADT_REG A LEFT JOIN USER_REG U ON A.USER_CODE = U.USER_CODE LEFT JOIN CAT_TYPE CT ON A.CAT_SPECIES = CT.SPECIES_CODE LEFT JOIN CAT_SEX CS ON A.CAT_SEX = CS.SEX_CODE LEFT JOIN ADDRESS AD ON A.CAT_ADDRESS = AD.ADDRESS_CODE LEFT JOIN ADT_CAT_AGE CA ON A.CAT_AGE_CODE = CA.CAT_AGE_CODE LEFT JOIN ADT_PROCESS AP ON A.ADT_PROC_CODE = AP.ADT_PROC_CODE LEFT JOIN ADT_TYPE AT ON A.ADT_TYPE = AT.ADT_TYPE_CODE WHERE AD.GU = #{searchGu} AND AD.DONG = #{searchDong} ORDER BY A.POST_DATE
SELECT * FROM ADT_REG_VIEW WHERE ${searchKey} = #{searchValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY POST_DATE
SELECT COUNT(*) AS dataCount FROM ADT_REG A LEFT JOIN ADDRESS AD ON A.CAT_ADDRESS = AD.ADDRESS_CODE WHERE AD.GU = #{searchGu} AND AD.DONG = #{searchDong}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY POST_DATE) AS NUM , A.ADT_CODE AS ADT_CODE , A.CAT_NAME AS CAT_NAME , U.NICKNAME AS USER_NICKNAME , TO_CHAR(A.RSQ_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RSQ_DATE , CT.SPECIES AS CAT_TYPE , CT.SPECIES_CODE AS CAT_TYPE_CODE , CS.SEX_CODE AS SEX_CODE , CS.SEX AS CAT_SEX , A.CAT_AGE AS CAT_AGE , AD.GU AS GU , AD.DONG AS DONG , AD.SI || ' ' || AD.GU || ' ' || AD.DONG AS CAT_ADDRESS , CA.CAT_AGE_CODE AS CAT_AGE_CODE , CA.CAT_AGE_TYPE AS CAT_AGE_TYPE , AP.ADT_PROC AS ADT_PROC , A.ADT_PROC_CODE AS ADT_PROC_CODE , A.ADT_TYPE AS ADT_TYPE_CODE , AT.ADT_TYPE AS ADT_TYPE , A.HIT_COUNT AS HITCOUNT , A.POST_DATE AS POST_DATE , A.POST_DATE + 15 AS END_DATE , A.CAT_REP_IMG AS CAT_REP_IMAGE , A.CAT_ECT1 AS CAT_ECT1 , A.CAT_ECT2 AS CAT_ECT2 , U.ID AS USER_ID , U.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME , A.TEL AS USER_TEL , A.EMAIL AS USER_EMAIL , A.ADT_REASON AS ADT_REASON , A.HIT_COUNT AS HIT_COUNT , A.ADT_CAT_EXP AS CAT_EXP , A.ADT_JOB AS JOB , A.ADT_MARRIAGE AS MARRIAGE , A.ADT_FAMILY_NUM AS FAMILY_NUM FROM ADT_REG A LEFT JOIN USER_REG U ON A.USER_CODE = U.USER_CODE LEFT JOIN CAT_TYPE CT ON A.CAT_SPECIES = CT.SPECIES_CODE LEFT JOIN CAT_SEX CS ON A.CAT_SEX = CS.SEX_CODE LEFT JOIN ADDRESS AD ON A.CAT_ADDRESS = AD.ADDRESS_CODE LEFT JOIN ADT_CAT_AGE CA ON A.CAT_AGE_CODE = CA.CAT_AGE_CODE LEFT JOIN ADT_PROCESS AP ON A.ADT_PROC_CODE = AP.ADT_PROC_CODE LEFT JOIN ADT_TYPE AT ON A.ADT_TYPE = AT.ADT_TYPE_CODE ORDER BY POST_DATE) WHERE NUM = #{articleNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT DISTINCT GU AS GU FROM ADDRESS ORDER BY GU ASC
SELECT DONG FROM ADDRESS WHERE GU=#{selectedGu,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY DONG ASC
SELECT UR.ID AS APPLICANT_ID FROM ADT_APPLY AP JOIN USER_REG UR ON AP.USER_CODE = UR.USER_CODE WHERE AP.ADT_CODE = #{ADT_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT U.ID AS ID , U.USER_NAME AS NAME , U.ADDRESS_CODE AS ADDRESS , AP.ADT_CAT_EXP AS A1C , AP.ADT_JOB AS A2C , AP.ADT_MARRIAGE AS A3C , AP.ADT_FAMILY_NUM AS A4C , DECODE(AP.ADT_CAT_EXP,'RT1','있음' ,'RT2','없음') AS A1 , AJ.ANSWER AS A2 , DECODE(AP.ADT_MARRIAGE,'RT1','기혼' ,'RT2','미혼')AS A3 , AFN.ANSWER AS A4 FROM ADT_APPLY AP JOIN USER_REG U ON U.USER_CODE = AP.USER_CODE JOIN ADT_REG AR ON AP.ADT_CODE = AR.ADT_CODE JOIN ADT_JOB AJ ON AP.ADT_JOB IN AJ.ADT_JOB JOIN ADT_FAMILY_NUM AFN ON AP.ADT_FAMILY_NUM IN AFN.ADT_FAMILY_NUM WHERE AR.ADT_CODE = #{adt_code}
SELECT SPECIES_CODE AS CAT_CODE , SPECIES AS SPECIES , SPECIES_IMG AS CAT_IMAGE FROM CAT_TYPE
